00043 #include "c6x.h"
00044 #include "sgemmKernel.h"

00046 #include "stdio.h"
00047 
00048 void sgemmKernel(const real *pA, const real *pB, real *pC, const real a, const int k, const int stepC)
00049 {
00050   __float2_t sum0, sum1, sum2, sum3, sum4, sum5, sum6, sum7;
00051   __float2_t sum8, sum9, suma, sumb, sumc, sumd, sume, sumf;
00052   __float2_t * restrict ptrB     = (__float2_t *) pB;
00053   __float2_t * restrict ptrA     = (__float2_t *) pA;
00054   __float2_t * restrict ptrC;
00055   __float2_t regA2, regC, regS;
00056   int_least16_t index;
00057 
00058   // zero out accumulators
00059   sum0 = 0.0;
00060   sum1 = 0.0;
00061   sum2 = 0.0;
00062   sum3 = 0.0;
00063   sum4 = 0.0;
00064   sum5 = 0.0;
00065   sum6 = 0.0;
00066   sum7 = 0.0;
00067   sum8 = 0.0;
00068   sum9 = 0.0;
00069   suma = 0.0;
00070   sumb = 0.0;
00071   sumc = 0.0;
00072   sumd = 0.0;
00073   sume = 0.0;
00074   sumf = 0.0;
00075 
00076   for (index = 0; index < k; index++)
00077   { // loop over k;
00078     // each iteration performs rank one update of 4x1 by 1x8
00079     // matrices of A and B respectively; result is
00080     // accumulated over 4x8 matrix
00081         __float2_t b01, b23, b45, b67, a01, a23;
00082         __x128_t   reg128;
00083 
00084     a01 = *ptrA++;
00085         a23 = *ptrA++;
00086 
00087     b01 = *ptrB++;
00088     b23 = *ptrB++;
00089     b45 = *ptrB++;
00090     b67 = *ptrB++;
00091 
00092     reg128 = _cmpysp(a01, b01);
00093     // accumulate a[0]*b[1] and -a[0]*b[0]
00094     sum0 = _daddsp(sum0, _lof2_128(reg128));
00095     // accumulate a[1]*b[0] and a[1]*b[1]
00096     sum1 = _daddsp(sum1, _hif2_128(reg128));
00097 
00098     reg128 = _cmpysp(a01, b23);
00099     // accumulate a[0]*b[3] and -a[0]*b[2]
00100     sum2 = _daddsp(sum2, _lof2_128(reg128));
00101     // accumulate a[1]*b[2] and a[1]*b[3]
00102     sum3 = _daddsp(sum3, _hif2_128(reg128));
00103 
00104     reg128 = _cmpysp(a01, b45);
00105     // accumulate a[0]*b[5] and -a[0]*b[4]
00106     sum4 = _daddsp(sum4, _lof2_128(reg128));
00107     // accumulate a[1]*b[4] and a[1]*b[5]
00108     sum5 = _daddsp(sum5, _hif2_128(reg128));
00109 
00110     reg128 = _cmpysp(a01, b67);
00111     // accumulate a[0]*b[7] and -a[0]*b[6]
00112     sum6 = _daddsp(sum6, _lof2_128(reg128));
00113     // accumulate a[1]*b[6] and a[1]*b[7]
00114     sum7 = _daddsp(sum7, _hif2_128(reg128));
00115 
00116     reg128 = _cmpysp(a23, b01);
00117     // accumulate a[2]*b[1] and -a[2]*b[0]
00118     sum8 = _daddsp(sum8, _lof2_128(reg128));
00119     // accumulate a[3]*b[0] and a[3]*b[1]
00120     sum9 = _daddsp(sum9, _hif2_128(reg128));
00121 
00122     reg128 = _cmpysp(a23, b23);
00123     // accumulate a[2]*b[3] and -a[2]*b[2]
00124     suma = _daddsp(suma, _lof2_128(reg128));
00125     // accumulate a[3]*b[2] and a[3]*b[3]
00126     sumb = _daddsp(sumb, _hif2_128(reg128));
00127 
00128     reg128 = _cmpysp(a23, b45);
00129     // accumulate a[2]*b[5] and -a[2]*b[4]
00130     sumc = _daddsp(sumc, _lof2_128(reg128));
00131     // accumulate a[3]*b[4] and a[3]*b[5]
00132     sumd = _daddsp(sumd, _hif2_128(reg128));
00133 
00134     reg128 = _cmpysp(a23, b67);
00135     // accumulate a[2]*b[7] and -a[2]*b[6]
00136     sume = _daddsp(sume, _lof2_128(reg128));
00137     // accumulate a[3]*b[6] and a[3]*b[7]
00138     sumf = _daddsp(sumf, _hif2_128(reg128));
00139 
00140   }
00141 
00142   {
00143     regA2 = _ftof2(a, a);
00144     index = (stepC>>1)-2;
00145 
00146     ptrC = (__float2_t *) pC;
00147     // update c[0,0] and c[1,0]
00148     regC = *ptrC;
00149     regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum1),-_hif2(sum0));
00150     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00151     // update c[2,0] and c[3,0]
00152     regC = *ptrC;
00153     regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum9),-_hif2(sum8));
00154     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00155 
00156     // move to next column
00157     ptrC += index;
00158     // update c[0,1] and c[1,1]
00159     regC = *ptrC;
00160     regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum1),_lof2(sum0));
00161     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00162     // update c[2,1] and c[3,1]
00163     regC = *ptrC;
00164     regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum9),_lof2(sum8));
00165     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00166 
00167     // move to next column
00168     ptrC += index;
00169     // update c[0,2] and c[1,2]
00170     regC = *ptrC;
00171     regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum3),-_hif2(sum2));
00172     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00173     // update c[2,2] and c[3,2]
00174     regC = *ptrC;
00175     regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumb),-_hif2(suma));
00176     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00177 
00178     // move to next column
00179     ptrC += index;
00180     // update c[0,3] and c[1,3]
00181     regC = *ptrC;
00182     regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum3),_lof2(sum2));
00183     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00184     // update c[2,3] and c[3,3]
00185     regC = *ptrC;
00186     regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sumb),_lof2(suma));
00187     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00188 
00189     // move to next column
00190     ptrC += index;
00191     // update c[0,4] and c[1,4]
00192     regC = *ptrC;
00193     regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum5),-_hif2(sum4));
00194     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00195     // update c[2,4] and c[3,4]
00196     regC = *ptrC;
00197     regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumd),-_hif2(sumc));
00198     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00199 
00200     // move to next column
00201     ptrC += index;
00202     // update c[0,5] and c[1,5]
00203     regC = *ptrC;
00204     regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum5),_lof2(sum4));
00205     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00206     // update c[2,5] and c[3,5]
00207     regC = *ptrC;
00208     regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sumd),_lof2(sumc));
00209     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00210 
00211     // move to next column
00212     ptrC += index;
00213     // update c[0,6] and c[1,6]
00214     regC = *ptrC;
00215     regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum7),-_hif2(sum6));
00216     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00217     // update c[2,6] and c[3,6]
00218     regC = *ptrC;
00219     regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumf),-_hif2(sume));
00220     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00221 
00222     // move to next column
00223     ptrC += index;
00224     // update c[0,7] and c[1,7]
00225     regC = *ptrC;
00226     regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum7),_lof2(sum6));
00227     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00228     // update c[2,7] and c[3,7]
00229     regC = *ptrC;
00230     regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sumf),_lof2(sume));
00231     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00232   }
00233   return;
00234 } // sgemmKernel()
00235 
00236 void sgemmKernelFlexSave(const real *pA, const real *pB, real *pC, const real a, const int k, const int stepC, const int saveLoc, const int flagisN)
00237 {
00238   __float2_t sum0, sum1, sum2, sum3, sum4, sum5, sum6, sum7;
00239   __float2_t sum8, sum9, suma, sumb, sumc, sumd, sume, sumf;
00240   __float2_t * restrict ptrB     = (__float2_t *) pB;
00241   __float2_t * restrict ptrA     = (__float2_t *) pA;
00242   __float2_t * restrict ptrC;
00243   __float2_t regA2, regC, regS;
00244   int_least16_t index;
00245 
00246   // zero out accumulators
00247   sum0 = 0.0;
00248   sum1 = 0.0;
00249   sum2 = 0.0;
00250   sum3 = 0.0;
00251   sum4 = 0.0;
00252   sum5 = 0.0;
00253   sum6 = 0.0;
00254   sum7 = 0.0;
00255   sum8 = 0.0;
00256   sum9 = 0.0;
00257   suma = 0.0;
00258   sumb = 0.0;
00259   sumc = 0.0;
00260   sumd = 0.0;
00261   sume = 0.0;
00262   sumf = 0.0;
00263 
00264   for (index = 0; index < k; index++)
00265   { // loop over k;
00266     // each iteration performs rank one update of 4x1 by 1x8
00267     // matrices of A and B respectively; result is
00268     // accumulated over 4x8 matrix
00269         __float2_t b01, b23, b45, b67, a01, a23;
00270         __x128_t   reg128;
00271 
00272         a01 = *ptrA++;
00273         a23 = *ptrA++;
00274 
00275     b01 = *ptrB++;
00276     b23 = *ptrB++;
00277     b45 = *ptrB++;
00278     b67 = *ptrB++;
00279 
00280     reg128 = _cmpysp(a01, b01);
00281     // accumulate a[0]*b[1] and -a[0]*b[0]
00282     sum0 = _daddsp(sum0, _lof2_128(reg128));
00283     // accumulate a[1]*b[0] and a[1]*b[1]
00284     sum1 = _daddsp(sum1, _hif2_128(reg128));
00285 
00286     reg128 = _cmpysp(a01, b23);
00287     // accumulate a[0]*b[3] and -a[0]*b[2]
00288     sum2 = _daddsp(sum2, _lof2_128(reg128));
00289     // accumulate a[1]*b[2] and a[1]*b[3]
00290     sum3 = _daddsp(sum3, _hif2_128(reg128));
00291 
00292     reg128 = _cmpysp(a01, b45);
00293     // accumulate a[0]*b[5] and -a[0]*b[4]
00294     sum4 = _daddsp(sum4, _lof2_128(reg128));
00295     // accumulate a[1]*b[4] and a[1]*b[5]
00296     sum5 = _daddsp(sum5, _hif2_128(reg128));
00297 
00298     reg128 = _cmpysp(a01, b67);
00299     // accumulate a[0]*b[7] and -a[0]*b[6]
00300     sum6 = _daddsp(sum6, _lof2_128(reg128));
00301     // accumulate a[1]*b[6] and a[1]*b[7]
00302     sum7 = _daddsp(sum7, _hif2_128(reg128));
00303 
00304     reg128 = _cmpysp(a23, b01);
00305     // accumulate a[2]*b[1] and -a[2]*b[0]
00306     sum8 = _daddsp(sum8, _lof2_128(reg128));
00307     // accumulate a[3]*b[0] and a[3]*b[1]
00308     sum9 = _daddsp(sum9, _hif2_128(reg128));
00309 
00310     reg128 = _cmpysp(a23, b23);
00311     // accumulate a[2]*b[3] and -a[2]*b[2]
00312     suma = _daddsp(suma, _lof2_128(reg128));
00313     // accumulate a[3]*b[2] and a[3]*b[3]
00314     sumb = _daddsp(sumb, _hif2_128(reg128));
00315 
00316     reg128 = _cmpysp(a23, b45);
00317     // accumulate a[2]*b[5] and -a[2]*b[4]
00318     sumc = _daddsp(sumc, _lof2_128(reg128));
00319     // accumulate a[3]*b[4] and a[3]*b[5]
00320     sumd = _daddsp(sumd, _hif2_128(reg128));
00321 
00322     reg128 = _cmpysp(a23, b67);
00323     // accumulate a[2]*b[7] and -a[2]*b[6]
00324     sume = _daddsp(sume, _lof2_128(reg128));
00325     // accumulate a[3]*b[6] and a[3]*b[7]
00326     sumf = _daddsp(sumf, _hif2_128(reg128));
00327   }
00328 
00329   regA2 = _ftof2(a, a);
00330   if(flagisN>0) // saving in normal form
00331   {
00332         index = (stepC>>1)-2;
00333 
00334     switch(saveLoc)
00335     {
00336     case -3:
00337     case -2:
00338     case -1:
00339     case 0:
00340     case 1:
00341     case 2:
00342     case 3:
00343     case 4:
00344     case 5:
00345     case 6:
00346           ptrC = (__float2_t *) pC;
00347           // update c[0,0] and c[1,0]
00348           regC = *ptrC;
00349           regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum1),-_hif2(sum0));
00350           if(saveLoc>-1) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00351           ptrC++;
00352           // update c[2,0] and c[3,0]
00353           regC = *ptrC;
00354           regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum9),-_hif2(sum8));
00355           if(saveLoc>-3) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00356           ptrC++;
00357 
00358             // move to next column
00359           ptrC += index;
00360           // update c[0,1] and c[1,1]
00361           regC = *ptrC;
00362           regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum1),_lof2(sum0));
00363           if(saveLoc>0) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00364           ptrC++;
00365           // update c[2,1] and c[3,1]
00366           regC = *ptrC;
00367           regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum9),_lof2(sum8));
00368           if(saveLoc>-2) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00369           ptrC++;
00370 
00371           // move to next column
00372           ptrC += index;
00373           // update c[0,2] and c[1,2]
00374           regC = *ptrC;
00375           regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum3),-_hif2(sum2));
00376           if(saveLoc>1) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00377           ptrC++;
00378           // update c[2,2] and c[3,2]
00379           regC = *ptrC;
00380           regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumb),-_hif2(suma));
00381           if(saveLoc>-1) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00382           ptrC++;
00383 
00384           // move to next column
00385           ptrC += index;
00386           // update c[0,3] and c[1,3]
00387           regC = *ptrC;
00388           regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum3),_lof2(sum2));
00389           if(saveLoc>2) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00390           ptrC++;
00391           // update c[2,3] and c[3,3]
00392           regC = *ptrC;
00393           regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sumb),_lof2(suma));
00394           if(saveLoc>0) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00395           ptrC++;
00396 
00397           // move to next column
00398           ptrC += index;
00399           // update c[0,4] and c[1,4]
00400           regC = *ptrC;
00401           regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum5),-_hif2(sum4));
00402           if(saveLoc>3) *ptrC =  _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00403           ptrC++;
00404           // update c[2,4] and c[3,4]
00405           regC = *ptrC;
00406           regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumd),-_hif2(sumc));
00407           if(saveLoc>1) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00408           ptrC++;
00409 
00410           // move to next column
00411           ptrC += index;
00412           // update c[0,5] and c[1,5]
00413           regC = *ptrC;
00414           regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum5),_lof2(sum4));
00415           if(saveLoc>4) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00416           ptrC++;
00417           // update c[2,5] and c[3,5]
00418           regC = *ptrC;
00419           regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sumd),_lof2(sumc));
00420           if(saveLoc>2) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00421           ptrC++;
00422 
00423           // move to next column
00424           ptrC += index;
00425           // update c[0,6] and c[1,6]
00426           regC = *ptrC;
00427           regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum7),-_hif2(sum6));
00428           if(saveLoc>5) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00429           ptrC++;
00430           // update c[2,6] and c[3,6]
00431           regC = *ptrC;
00432           regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumf),-_hif2(sume));
00433           if(saveLoc>3) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00434           ptrC++;
00435 
00436           // move to next column
00437           ptrC += index;
00438           // update c[0,7] and c[1,7]
00439           regC = *ptrC;
00440           regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum7),_lof2(sum6));
00441           if(saveLoc>6) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00442           ptrC++;
00443           // update c[2,7] and c[3,7]
00444           regC = *ptrC;
00445           regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sumf),_lof2(sume));
00446           if(saveLoc>4) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00447           ptrC++;
00448 
00449           // update c[1,0] if necessary
00450           pC++;
00451           if(saveLoc==-1) *pC = *pC + a * _lof2(sum1);
00452           // update c[3,0] if necessary
00453           pC += 2;
00454           if(saveLoc==-3) *pC = *pC + a * _lof2(sum9);
00455           // update c[1,1] if necessary
00456           pC += (stepC-2);
00457           if(saveLoc==0) *pC = *pC + a * _hif2(sum1);
00458           // update c[3,1] if necessary
00459           pC += 2;
00460           if(saveLoc==-2) *pC = *pC + a * _hif2(sum9);
00461           // update c[1,2] if necessary
00462           pC += (stepC-2);
00463           if(saveLoc==1) *pC = *pC + a * _lof2(sum3);
00464           // update c[3,2] if necessary
00465           pC += 2;
00466           if(saveLoc==-1) *pC = *pC + a * _lof2(sumb);
00467           // update c[1,3] if necessary
00468           pC += (stepC-2);
00469           if(saveLoc==2) *pC = *pC + a * _hif2(sum3);
00470           // update c[3,3] if necessary
00471           pC += 2;
00472           if(saveLoc==0) *pC = *pC + a * _hif2(sumb);
00473           // update c[1,4] if necessary
00474           pC += (stepC-2);
00475           if(saveLoc==3) *pC = *pC + a * _lof2(sum5);
00476           // update c[3,4] if necessary
00477           pC += 2;
00478           if(saveLoc==1) *pC = *pC + a * _lof2(sumd);
00479           // update c[1,5] if necessary
00480           pC += (stepC-2);
00481           if(saveLoc==4) *pC = *pC + a * _hif2(sum5);
00482           // update c[3,5] if necessary
00483           pC += 2;
00484           if(saveLoc==2) *pC = *pC + a * _hif2(sumd);
00485           // update c[1,6] if necessary
00486           pC += (stepC-2);
00487           if(saveLoc==5) *pC = *pC + a * _lof2(sum7);
00488           // update c[3,6] if necessary
00489           pC += 2;
00490           if(saveLoc==3) *pC = *pC + a * _lof2(sumf);
00491           // update c[1,7] if necessary
00492           pC += (stepC-2);
00493           if(saveLoc==6) *pC = *pC + a * _hif2(sum7);
00494           // update c[3,7] if necessary
00495           pC += 2;
00496           if(saveLoc==4) *pC = *pC + a * _hif2(sumf);
00497 
00498           break;
00499   default:
00500     ptrC = (__float2_t *) pC;
00501     // update c[0,0] and c[1,0]
00502     regC = *ptrC;
00503     regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum1),-_hif2(sum0));
00504     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00505     // update c[2,0] and c[3,0]
00506     regC = *ptrC;
00507     regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum9),-_hif2(sum8));
00508     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00509 
00510     // move to next column
00511     ptrC += index;
00512     // update c[0,1] and c[1,1]
00513     regC = *ptrC;
00514     regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum1),_lof2(sum0));
00515     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00516     // update c[2,1] and c[3,1]
00517     regC = *ptrC;
00518     regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum9),_lof2(sum8));
00519     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00520 
00521     // move to next column
00522     ptrC += index;
00523     // update c[0,2] and c[1,2]
00524     regC = *ptrC;
00525     regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum3),-_hif2(sum2));
00526     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00527     // update c[2,2] and c[3,2]
00528     regC = *ptrC;
00529     regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumb),-_hif2(suma));
00530     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00531 
00532     // move to next column
00533     ptrC += index;
00534     // update c[0,3] and c[1,3]
00535     regC = *ptrC;
00536     regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum3),_lof2(sum2));
00537     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00538     // update c[2,3] and c[3,3]
00539     regC = *ptrC;
00540     regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sumb),_lof2(suma));
00541     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00542 
00543     // move to next column
00544     ptrC += index;
00545     // update c[0,4] and c[1,4]
00546     regC = *ptrC;
00547     regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum5),-_hif2(sum4));
00548     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00549     // update c[2,4] and c[3,4]
00550     regC = *ptrC;
00551     regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumd),-_hif2(sumc));
00552     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00553 
00554     // move to next column
00555     ptrC += index;
00556     // update c[0,5] and c[1,5]
00557     regC = *ptrC;
00558     regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum5),_lof2(sum4));
00559     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00560     // update c[2,5] and c[3,5]
00561     regC = *ptrC;
00562     regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sumd),_lof2(sumc));
00563     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00564 
00565     // move to next column
00566     ptrC += index;
00567     // update c[0,6] and c[1,6]
00568     regC = *ptrC;
00569     regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum7),-_hif2(sum6));
00570     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00571     // update c[2,6] and c[3,6]
00572     regC = *ptrC;
00573     regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumf),-_hif2(sume));
00574     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00575 
00576     // move to next column
00577     ptrC += index;
00578     // update c[0,7] and c[1,7]
00579     regC = *ptrC;
00580     regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum7),_lof2(sum6));
00581     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00582     // update c[2,7] and c[3,7]
00583     regC = *ptrC;
00584     regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sumf),_lof2(sume));
00585     *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00586   }
00587   }
00588   else // saving in transpose form
00589   {
00590     index = (stepC>>1)-4;
00591 
00592         switch(saveLoc)
00593         {
00594           case -3:
00595           case -2:
00596           case -1:
00597           case 0:
00598           case 1:
00599           case 2:
00600           case 3:
00601           case 4:
00602           case 5:
00603           case 6:
00604             ptrC = (__float2_t *) pC;
00605                 // update c[0,0] and c[0,1]
00606                 regC = *ptrC;
00607                 regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum0),-_hif2(sum0));
00608                 if(saveLoc>0) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00609                 ptrC++;
00610                 // update c[0,2] and c[0,3]
00611                 regC = *ptrC;
00612                 regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum2),-_hif2(sum2));
00613                 if(saveLoc>2) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00614                 ptrC++;
00615 
00616                 // update c[0,4] and c[0,5]
00617                 regC = *ptrC;
00618                 regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum4),-_hif2(sum4));
00619                 if(saveLoc>4) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00620                 ptrC++;
00621                 // update c[0,6] and c[0,7]
00622                 regC = *ptrC;
00623                 regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum6),-_hif2(sum6));
00624                 if(saveLoc>6) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00625                 ptrC++;
00626 
00627                 // move to next column
00628                 ptrC += index;
00629                 // update c[1,0] and c[1,1]
00630                 regC = *ptrC;
00631                 regS = sum1;
00632                 if(saveLoc>-1) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00633                 ptrC++;
00634                 // update c[1,2] and c[1,3]
00635                 regC = *ptrC;
00636                 regS = sum3;
00637                 if(saveLoc>1) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00638                 ptrC++;
00639 
00640                 // update c[1,4] and c[1,5]
00641                 regC = *ptrC;
00642                 regS = sum5;
00643                 if(saveLoc>3) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00644                 ptrC++;
00645                 // update c[1,6] and c[1,7]
00646                 regC = *ptrC;
00647                 regS = sum7;
00648                 if(saveLoc>5) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00649                 ptrC++;
00650 
00651                 // move to next column
00652                 ptrC += index;
00653                 // update c[2,0] and c[2,1]
00654                 regC = *ptrC;
00655                 regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum8),-_hif2(sum8));
00656                 if(saveLoc>-2) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00657                 ptrC++;
00658                 // update c[2,2] and c[2,3]
00659                 regC = *ptrC;
00660                 regS = _ftof2(_lof2(suma),-_hif2(suma));
00661                 if(saveLoc>0) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00662                 ptrC++;
00663 
00664                 // update c[2,4] and c[2,5]
00665                 regC = *ptrC;
00666                 regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumc),-_hif2(sumc));
00667                 if(saveLoc>2) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00668                 ptrC++;
00669                 // update c[2,6] and c[2,7]
00670                 regC = *ptrC;
00671                 regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sume),-_hif2(sume));
00672                 if(saveLoc>4) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00673                 ptrC++;
00674 
00675                 // move to next column
00676                 ptrC += index;
00677                 // update c[3,0] and c[3,1]
00678                 regC = *ptrC;
00679                 regS = sum9;
00680                 if(saveLoc>-3) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00681                 ptrC++;
00682                 // update c[3,2] and c[3,3]
00683                 regC = *ptrC;
00684                 regS = sumb;
00685                 if(saveLoc>-1) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00686                 ptrC++;
00687 
00688                 // update c[3,4] and c[3,5]
00689                 regC = *ptrC;
00690                 regS = sumd;
00691                 if(saveLoc>1) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00692                 ptrC++;
00693                 // update c[3,6] and c[3,7]
00694                 regC = *ptrC;
00695                 regS = sumf;
00696                 if(saveLoc>3) *ptrC = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00697                 ptrC++;
00698 
00699                 // update c[0,0] if necessary
00700                 if(saveLoc==0) *pC = *pC - a * _hif2(sum0);
00701                 // update c[0,2] if necessary
00702                 pC += 2;
00703                 if(saveLoc==2) *pC = *pC - a * _hif2(sum2);
00704                 // update c[0,4] if necessary
00705                 pC += 2;
00706                 if(saveLoc==4) *pC = *pC - a * _hif2(sum4);
00707                 // update c[0,6] if necessary
00708                 pC += 2;
00709                 if(saveLoc==6) *pC = *pC - a * _hif2(sum6);
00710                 // update c[1,0] if necessary
00711                 pC += (stepC-6);
00712                 if(saveLoc==-1) *pC = *pC + a * _lof2(sum1);
00713                 // update c[1,2] if necessary
00714                 pC += 2;
00715                 if(saveLoc==1) *pC = *pC + a * _lof2(sum3);
00716                 // update c[1,4] if necessary
00717                 pC += 2;
00718                 if(saveLoc==3) *pC = *pC + a * _lof2(sum5);
00719                 // update c[1,6] if necessary
00720                 pC += 2;
00721                 if(saveLoc==5) *pC = *pC + a * _lof2(sum7);
00722                 // update c[2,0] if necessary
00723                 pC += (stepC-6);
00724                 if(saveLoc==-2) *pC = *pC - a * _hif2(sum8);
00725                 // update c[2,2] if necessary
00726                 pC += 2;
00727                 if(saveLoc==0) *pC = *pC - a * _hif2(suma);
00728                 // update c[2,4] if necessary
00729                 pC += 2;
00730                 if(saveLoc==2) *pC = *pC - a * _hif2(sumc);
00731                 // update c[2,6] if necessary
00732                 pC += 2;
00733                 if(saveLoc==4) *pC = *pC - a * _hif2(sume);
00734                 // update c[3,0] if necessary
00735                 pC += (stepC-6);
00736                 if(saveLoc==-3) *pC = *pC + a * _lof2(sum9);
00737                 // update c[3,2] if necessary
00738                 pC += 2;
00739                 if(saveLoc==-1) *pC = *pC + a * _lof2(sumb);
00740                 // update c[3,4] if necessary
00741                 pC += 2;
00742                 if(saveLoc==1) *pC = *pC + a * _lof2(sumd);
00743                 // update c[3,6] if necessary
00744                 pC += 2;
00745                 if(saveLoc==3) *pC = *pC + a * _lof2(sumf);
00746 
00747                 break;
00748 
00749           default:
00750                 ptrC = (__float2_t *) pC;
00751                 // update c[0,0] and c[0,1]
00752                 regC = *ptrC;
00753                 regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum0),-_hif2(sum0));
00754                 *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00755                 // update c[0,2] and c[0,3]
00756                 regC = *ptrC;
00757                 regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum2),-_hif2(sum2));
00758                 *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00759 
00760                 // update c[0,4] and c[0,5]
00761             regC = *ptrC;
00762                 regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum4),-_hif2(sum4));
00763                 *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00764                 // update c[0,6] and c[0,7]
00765                 regC = *ptrC;
00766                 regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum6),-_hif2(sum6));
00767                 *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00768 
00769                 // move to next column
00770                 ptrC += index;
00771                 // update c[1,0] and c[1,1]
00772                 regC = *ptrC;
00773                 regS = sum1;
00774                 *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00775                 // update c[1,2] and c[1,3]
00776                 regC = *ptrC;
00777                 regS = sum3;
00778                 *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00779 
00780                 // update c[1,4] and c[1,5]
00781                 regC = *ptrC;
00782                 regS = sum5;
00783                 *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00784                 // update c[1,6] and c[1,7]
00785                 regC = *ptrC;
00786                 regS = sum7;
00787                 *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00788 
00789                 // move to next column
00790                 ptrC += index;
00791                 // update c[2,0] and c[2,1]
00792                 regC = *ptrC;
00793                 regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum8),-_hif2(sum8));
00794                 *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00795                 // update c[2,2] and c[2,3]
00796                 regC = *ptrC;
00797                 regS = _ftof2(_lof2(suma),-_hif2(suma));
00798                 *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00799 
00800                 // update c[2,4] and c[2,5]
00801                 regC = *ptrC;
00802                 regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumc),-_hif2(sumc));
00803                 *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00804                 // update c[2,6] and c[2,7]
00805                 regC = *ptrC;
00806                 regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sume),-_hif2(sume));
00807                 *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00808 
00809                 // move to next column
00810                 ptrC += index;
00811                 // update c[3,0] and c[3,1]
00812                 regC = *ptrC;
00813                 regS = sum9;
00814                 *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00815                 // update c[3,2] and c[3,3]
00816                 regC = *ptrC;
00817                 regS = sumb;
00818                 *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00819 
00820                 // update c[3,4] and c[3,5]
00821                 regC = *ptrC;
00822                 regS = sumd;
00823                 *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00824                 // update c[3,6] and c[3,7]
00825                 regC = *ptrC;
00826                 regS = sumf;
00827                 *ptrC++ = _daddsp(_dmpysp(regA2, regS), regC);
00828         }
00829   }
00830   return;
00831 } // sgemmKernelFlexSave()
00832 
00833 
00834 void sgemmKernelNoReadFlexSave(const real *pA, const real *pB, real *pC, const real a, const int k, const int stepC, const int saveLoc, const int flagisN)
00835 {
00836   __float2_t sum0, sum1, sum2, sum3, sum4, sum5, sum6, sum7;
00837   __float2_t sum8, sum9, suma, sumb, sumc, sumd, sume, sumf;
00838   __float2_t * restrict ptrB     = (__float2_t *) pB;
00839   __float2_t * restrict ptrA     = (__float2_t *) pA;
00840   __float2_t * restrict ptrC;
00841   __float2_t regA2, regS;
00842   int_least16_t index;
00843 
00844   // zero out accumulators
00845   sum0 = 0.0;
00846   sum1 = 0.0;
00847   sum2 = 0.0;
00848   sum3 = 0.0;
00849   sum4 = 0.0;
00850   sum5 = 0.0;
00851   sum6 = 0.0;
00852   sum7 = 0.0;
00853   sum8 = 0.0;
00854   sum9 = 0.0;
00855   suma = 0.0;
00856   sumb = 0.0;
00857   sumc = 0.0;
00858   sumd = 0.0;
00859   sume = 0.0;
00860   sumf = 0.0;
00861 
00862   for (index = 0; index < k; index++)
00863   { // loop over k;
00864     // each iteration performs rank one update of 4x1 by 1x8
00865     // matrices of A and B respectively; result is
00866     // accumulated over 4x8 matrix
00867         __float2_t b01, b23, b45, b67, a01, a23;
00868         __x128_t   reg128;
00869 
00870         a01 = *ptrA++;
00871         a23 = *ptrA++;
00872 
00873     b01 = *ptrB++;
00874     b23 = *ptrB++;
00875     b45 = *ptrB++;
00876     b67 = *ptrB++;
00877 
00878     reg128 = _cmpysp(a01, b01);
00879     // accumulate a[0]*b[1] and -a[0]*b[0]
00880     sum0 = _daddsp(sum0, _lof2_128(reg128));
00881     // accumulate a[1]*b[0] and a[1]*b[1]
00882     sum1 = _daddsp(sum1, _hif2_128(reg128));
00883 
00884     reg128 = _cmpysp(a01, b23);
00885     // accumulate a[0]*b[3] and -a[0]*b[2]
00886     sum2 = _daddsp(sum2, _lof2_128(reg128));
00887     // accumulate a[1]*b[2] and a[1]*b[3]
00888     sum3 = _daddsp(sum3, _hif2_128(reg128));
00889 
00890     reg128 = _cmpysp(a01, b45);
00891     // accumulate a[0]*b[5] and -a[0]*b[4]
00892     sum4 = _daddsp(sum4, _lof2_128(reg128));
00893     // accumulate a[1]*b[4] and a[1]*b[5]
00894     sum5 = _daddsp(sum5, _hif2_128(reg128));
00895 
00896     reg128 = _cmpysp(a01, b67);
00897     // accumulate a[0]*b[7] and -a[0]*b[6]
00898     sum6 = _daddsp(sum6, _lof2_128(reg128));
00899     // accumulate a[1]*b[6] and a[1]*b[7]
00900     sum7 = _daddsp(sum7, _hif2_128(reg128));
00901 
00902     reg128 = _cmpysp(a23, b01);
00903     // accumulate a[2]*b[1] and -a[2]*b[0]
00904     sum8 = _daddsp(sum8, _lof2_128(reg128));
00905     // accumulate a[3]*b[0] and a[3]*b[1]
00906     sum9 = _daddsp(sum9, _hif2_128(reg128));
00907 
00908     reg128 = _cmpysp(a23, b23);
00909     // accumulate a[2]*b[3] and -a[2]*b[2]
00910     suma = _daddsp(suma, _lof2_128(reg128));
00911     // accumulate a[3]*b[2] and a[3]*b[3]
00912     sumb = _daddsp(sumb, _hif2_128(reg128));
00913 
00914     reg128 = _cmpysp(a23, b45);
00915     // accumulate a[2]*b[5] and -a[2]*b[4]
00916     sumc = _daddsp(sumc, _lof2_128(reg128));
00917     // accumulate a[3]*b[4] and a[3]*b[5]
00918     sumd = _daddsp(sumd, _hif2_128(reg128));
00919 
00920     reg128 = _cmpysp(a23, b67);
00921     // accumulate a[2]*b[7] and -a[2]*b[6]
00922     sume = _daddsp(sume, _lof2_128(reg128));
00923     // accumulate a[3]*b[6] and a[3]*b[7]
00924     sumf = _daddsp(sumf, _hif2_128(reg128));
00925   }
00926 
00927   regA2 = _ftof2(a, a);
00928   if(flagisN>0) // saving in normal form
00929   {
00930         index = (stepC>>1)-2;
00931       switch(saveLoc)
00932           {
00933             case -3:
00934             case -2:
00935             case -1:
00936             case 0:
00937             case 1:
00938             case 2:
00939             case 3:
00940             case 4:
00941             case 5:
00942             case 6:
00943                   ptrC = (__float2_t *) pC;
00944                   // save c[0,0] and c[1,0]
00945                   regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum1),-_hif2(sum0));
00946                   if(saveLoc>-1) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
00947                   ptrC++;
00948                   // save c[2,0] and c[3,0]
00949                   regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum9),-_hif2(sum8));
00950                   if(saveLoc>-3) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
00951                   ptrC++;
00952 
00953                     // move to next column
00954                   ptrC += index;
00955                   // save c[0,1] and c[1,1]
00956                   regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum1),_lof2(sum0));
00957                   if(saveLoc>0) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
00958                   ptrC++;
00959                   // save c[2,1] and c[3,1]
00960                   regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum9),_lof2(sum8));
00961                   if(saveLoc>-2) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
00962                   ptrC++;
00963 
00964                   // move to next column
00965                   ptrC += index;
00966                   // save c[0,2] and c[1,2]
00967                   regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum3),-_hif2(sum2));
00968                   if(saveLoc>1) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
00969                   ptrC++;
00970                   // save c[2,2] and c[3,2]
00971                   regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumb),-_hif2(suma));
00972                   if(saveLoc>-1) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
00973                   ptrC++;
00974 
00975                   // move to next column
00976                   ptrC += index;
00977                   // save c[0,3] and c[1,3]
00978                   regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum3),_lof2(sum2));
00979                   if(saveLoc>2) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
00980                   ptrC++;
00981                   // save c[2,3] and c[3,3]
00982                   regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sumb),_lof2(suma));
00983                   if(saveLoc>0) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
00984                   ptrC++;
00985 
00986                   // move to next column
00987                   ptrC += index;
00988                   // save c[0,4] and c[1,4]
00989                   regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum5),-_hif2(sum4));
00990                   if(saveLoc>3) *ptrC =  _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
00991                   ptrC++;
00992                   // save c[2,4] and c[3,4]
00993                   regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumd),-_hif2(sumc));
00994                   if(saveLoc>1) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
00995                   ptrC++;
00996 
00997                   // move to next column
00998                   ptrC += index;
00999                   // save c[0,5] and c[1,5]
01000                   regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum5),_lof2(sum4));
01001                   if(saveLoc>4) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01002                   ptrC++;
01003                   // save c[2,5] and c[3,5]
01004                   regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sumd),_lof2(sumc));
01005                   if(saveLoc>2) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01006                   ptrC++;
01007 
01008                   // move to next column
01009                   ptrC += index;
01010                   // save c[0,6] and c[1,6]
01011                   regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum7),-_hif2(sum6));
01012                   if(saveLoc>5) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01013                   ptrC++;
01014                   // save c[2,6] and c[3,6]
01015                   regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumf),-_hif2(sume));
01016                   if(saveLoc>3) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01017                   ptrC++;
01018 
01019                   // move to next column
01020                   ptrC += index;
01021                   // save c[0,7] and c[1,7]
01022                   regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum7),_lof2(sum6));
01023                   if(saveLoc>6) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01024                   ptrC++;
01025                   // save c[2,7] and c[3,7]
01026                   regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sumf),_lof2(sume));
01027                   if(saveLoc>4) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01028                   ptrC++;
01029 
01030                   // save c[1,0] if necessary
01031                   pC++;
01032                   if(saveLoc==-1) *pC = a * _lof2(sum1);
01033                   // save c[3,0] if necessary
01034                   pC += 2;
01035                   if(saveLoc==-3) *pC = a * _lof2(sum9);
01036                   // save c[1,1] if necessary
01037                   pC += (stepC-2);
01038                   if(saveLoc==0) *pC = a * _hif2(sum1);
01039                   // save c[3,1] if necessary
01040                   pC += 2;
01041                   if(saveLoc==-2) *pC = a * _hif2(sum9);
01042                   // save c[1,2] if necessary
01043                   pC += (stepC-2);
01044                   if(saveLoc==1) *pC = a * _lof2(sum3);
01045                   // save c[3,2] if necessary
01046                   pC += 2;
01047                   if(saveLoc==-1) *pC = a * _lof2(sumb);
01048                   // save c[1,3] if necessary
01049                   pC += (stepC-2);
01050                   if(saveLoc==2) *pC = a * _hif2(sum3);
01051                   // save c[3,3] if necessary
01052                   pC += 2;
01053                   if(saveLoc==0) *pC = a * _hif2(sumb);
01054                   // save c[1,4] if necessary
01055                   pC += (stepC-2);
01056                   if(saveLoc==3) *pC = a * _lof2(sum5);
01057                   // save c[3,4] if necessary
01058                   pC += 2;
01059                   if(saveLoc==1) *pC = a * _lof2(sumd);
01060                   // save c[1,5] if necessary
01061                   pC += (stepC-2);
01062                   if(saveLoc==4) *pC = a * _hif2(sum5);
01063                   // save c[3,5] if necessary
01064                   pC += 2;
01065                   if(saveLoc==2) *pC = a * _hif2(sumd);
01066                   // save c[1,6] if necessary
01067                   pC += (stepC-2);
01068                   if(saveLoc==5) *pC = a * _lof2(sum7);
01069                   // save c[3,6] if necessary
01070                   pC += 2;
01071                   if(saveLoc==3) *pC = a * _lof2(sumf);
01072                   // save c[1,7] if necessary
01073                   pC += (stepC-2);
01074                   if(saveLoc==6) *pC = a * _hif2(sum7);
01075                   // save c[3,7] if necessary
01076                   pC += 2;
01077                   if(saveLoc==4) *pC = a * _hif2(sumf);
01078 
01079                   break;
01080             default:
01081               ptrC = (__float2_t *) pC;
01082               // save c[0,0] and c[1,0]
01083               regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum1),-_hif2(sum0));
01084               *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01085               // save c[2,0] and c[3,0]
01086               regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum9),-_hif2(sum8));
01087               *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01088 
01089               // move to next column
01090               ptrC += index;
01091               // save c[0,1] and c[1,1]
01092               regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum1),_lof2(sum0));
01093               *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01094               // save c[2,1] and c[3,1]
01095               regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum9),_lof2(sum8));
01096               *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01097 
01098               // move to next column
01099               ptrC += index;
01100               // save c[0,2] and c[1,2]
01101               regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum3),-_hif2(sum2));
01102               *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01103               // save c[2,2] and c[3,2]
01104               regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumb),-_hif2(suma));
01105               *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01106 
01107               // move to next column
01108               ptrC += index;
01109               // save c[0,3] and c[1,3]
01110               regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum3),_lof2(sum2));
01111               *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01112               // save c[2,3] and c[3,3]
01113               regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sumb),_lof2(suma));
01114               *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01115 
01116               // move to next column
01117               ptrC += index;
01118               // save c[0,4] and c[1,4]
01119               regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum5),-_hif2(sum4));
01120               *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01121               // save c[2,4] and c[3,4]
01122               regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumd),-_hif2(sumc));
01123               *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01124 
01125               // move to next column
01126               ptrC += index;
01127               // save c[0,5] and c[1,5]
01128               regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum5),_lof2(sum4));
01129               *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01130               // save c[2,5] and c[3,5]
01131               regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sumd),_lof2(sumc));
01132               *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01133 
01134               // move to next column
01135               ptrC += index;
01136               // save c[0,6] and c[1,6]
01137               regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum7),-_hif2(sum6));
01138               *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01139               // save c[2,6] and c[3,6]
01140               regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumf),-_hif2(sume));
01141               *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01142 
01143               // move to next column
01144               ptrC += index;
01145               // save c[0,7] and c[1,7]
01146               regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sum7),_lof2(sum6));
01147               *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01148               // save c[2,7] and c[3,7]
01149               regS = _ftof2(_hif2(sumf),_lof2(sume));
01150               *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01151             }
01152           }
01153           else // saving in transpose form
01154           {
01155             index = (stepC>>1)-4;
01156 
01157                 switch(saveLoc)
01158                 {
01159                   case -3:
01160                   case -2:
01161                   case -1:
01162                   case 0:
01163                   case 1:
01164                   case 2:
01165                   case 3:
01166                   case 4:
01167                   case 5:
01168                   case 6:
01169                     ptrC = (__float2_t *) pC;
01170                         // save c[0,0] and c[0,1]
01171                         regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum0),-_hif2(sum0));
01172                         if(saveLoc>0) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01173                         ptrC++;
01174                         // save c[0,2] and c[0,3]
01175                         regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum2),-_hif2(sum2));
01176                         if(saveLoc>2) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01177                         ptrC++;
01178 
01179                         // save c[0,4] and c[0,5]
01180                         regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum4),-_hif2(sum4));
01181                         if(saveLoc>4) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01182                         ptrC++;
01183                         // save c[0,6] and c[0,7]
01184                         regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum6),-_hif2(sum6));
01185                         if(saveLoc>6) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01186                         ptrC++;
01187 
01188                         // move to next column
01189                         ptrC += index;
01190                         // save c[1,0] and c[1,1]
01191                         regS = sum1;
01192                         if(saveLoc>-1) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01193                         ptrC++;
01194                         // save c[1,2] and c[1,3]
01195                         regS = sum3;
01196                         if(saveLoc>1) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01197                         ptrC++;
01198 
01199                         // save c[1,4] and c[1,5]
01200                         regS = sum5;
01201                         if(saveLoc>3) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01202                         ptrC++;
01203                         // save c[1,6] and c[1,7]
01204                         regS = sum7;
01205                         if(saveLoc>5) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01206                         ptrC++;
01207 
01208                         // move to next column
01209                         ptrC += index;
01210                         // save c[2,0] and c[2,1]
01211                         regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum8),-_hif2(sum8));
01212                         if(saveLoc>-2) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01213                         ptrC++;
01214                         // save c[2,2] and c[2,3]
01215                         regS = _ftof2(_lof2(suma),-_hif2(suma));
01216                         if(saveLoc>0) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01217                         ptrC++;
01218 
01219                         // save c[2,4] and c[2,5]
01220                         regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumc),-_hif2(sumc));
01221                         if(saveLoc>2) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01222                         ptrC++;
01223                         // save c[2,6] and c[2,7]
01224                         regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sume),-_hif2(sume));
01225                         if(saveLoc>4) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01226                         ptrC++;
01227 
01228                         // move to next column
01229                         ptrC += index;
01230                         // save c[3,0] and c[3,1]
01231                         regS = sum9;
01232                         if(saveLoc>-3) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01233                         ptrC++;
01234                         // save c[3,2] and c[3,3]
01235                         regS = sumb;
01236                         if(saveLoc>-1) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01237                         ptrC++;
01238 
01239                         // save c[3,4] and c[3,5]
01240                         regS = sumd;
01241                         if(saveLoc>1) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01242                         ptrC++;
01243                         // save c[3,6] and c[3,7]
01244                         regS = sumf;
01245                         if(saveLoc>3) *ptrC = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01246                         ptrC++;
01247 
01248                         // save c[0,0] if necessary
01249                         if(saveLoc==0) *pC = - a * _hif2(sum0);
01250                         // save c[0,2] if necessary
01251                         pC += 2;
01252                         if(saveLoc==2) *pC = - a * _hif2(sum2);
01253                         // save c[0,4] if necessary
01254                         pC += 2;
01255                         if(saveLoc==4) *pC = - a * _hif2(sum4);
01256                         // save c[0,6] if necessary
01257                         pC += 2;
01258                         if(saveLoc==6) *pC = - a * _hif2(sum6);
01259                         // save c[1,0] if necessary
01260                         pC += (stepC-6);
01261                         if(saveLoc==-1) *pC = a * _lof2(sum1);
01262                         // save c[1,2] if necessary
01263                         pC += 2;
01264                         if(saveLoc==1) *pC = a * _lof2(sum3);
01265                         // save c[1,4] if necessary
01266                         pC += 2;
01267                         if(saveLoc==3) *pC = a * _lof2(sum5);
01268                         // save c[1,6] if necessary
01269                         pC += 2;
01270                         if(saveLoc==5) *pC = a * _lof2(sum7);
01271                         // save c[2,0] if necessary
01272                         pC += (stepC-6);
01273                         if(saveLoc==-2) *pC = - a * _hif2(sum8);
01274                         // save c[2,2] if necessary
01275                         pC += 2;
01276                         if(saveLoc==0) *pC = - a * _hif2(suma);
01277                         // save c[2,4] if necessary
01278                         pC += 2;
01279                         if(saveLoc==2) *pC = - a * _hif2(sumc);
01280                         // save c[2,6] if necessary
01281                         pC += 2;
01282                         if(saveLoc==4) *pC = - a * _hif2(sume);
01283                         // save c[3,0] if necessary
01284                         pC += (stepC-6);
01285                         if(saveLoc==-3) *pC = a * _lof2(sum9);
01286                         // save c[3,2] if necessary
01287                         pC += 2;
01288                         if(saveLoc==-1) *pC = a * _lof2(sumb);
01289                         // save c[3,4] if necessary
01290                         pC += 2;
01291                         if(saveLoc==1) *pC = a * _lof2(sumd);
01292                         // save c[3,6] if necessary
01293                         pC += 2;
01294                         if(saveLoc==3) *pC = a * _lof2(sumf);
01295 
01296                         break;
01297 
01298                   default:
01299                         ptrC = (__float2_t *) pC;
01300                         // save c[0,0] and c[0,1]
01301                         regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum0),-_hif2(sum0));
01302                         *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01303                         // save c[0,2] and c[0,3]
01304                         regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum2),-_hif2(sum2));
01305                         *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01306 
01307                         // save c[0,4] and c[0,5]
01308                         regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum4),-_hif2(sum4));
01309                         *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01310                         // save c[0,6] and c[0,7]
01311                         regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum6),-_hif2(sum6));
01312                         *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01313 
01314                         // move to next column
01315                         ptrC += index;
01316                         // save c[1,0] and c[1,1]
01317                         regS = sum1;
01318                         *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01319                         // save c[1,2] and c[1,3]
01320                         regS = sum3;
01321                         *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01322 
01323                         // save c[1,4] and c[1,5]
01324                         regS = sum5;
01325                         *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01326                         // save c[1,6] and c[1,7]
01327                         regS = sum7;
01328                         *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01329 
01330                         // move to next column
01331                         ptrC += index;
01332                         // save c[2,0] and c[2,1]
01333                         regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sum8),-_hif2(sum8));
01334                         *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01335                         // save c[2,2] and c[2,3]
01336                         regS = _ftof2(_lof2(suma),-_hif2(suma));
01337                         *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01338 
01339                         // save c[2,4] and c[2,5]
01340                         regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sumc),-_hif2(sumc));
01341                         *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01342                         // save c[2,6] and c[2,7]
01343                         regS = _ftof2(_lof2(sume),-_hif2(sume));
01344                         *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01345 
01346                         // move to next column
01347                         ptrC += index;
01348                         // save c[3,0] and c[3,1]
01349                         regS = sum9;
01350                         *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01351                         // save c[3,2] and c[3,3]
01352                         regS = sumb;
01353                         *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01354 
01355                         // save c[3,4] and c[3,5]
01356                         regS = sumd;
01357                         *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01358                         // save c[3,6] and c[3,7]
01359                         regS = sumf;
01360                         *ptrC++ = _dmpysp(regA2, regS);
01361                 }
01362           }
01363           return;
01364 } // sgemmKernelNoReadFlexSave()
